C

Chat - package Chat
 
clearChat() - Method in class Chat.ClientFrame
Clears completely the text box where is all the information about the chat.
ClientFrame - Class in Chat
The GUI class of the client window which also contains all the method that required for communication with the server (Except the serialization method which is in SerializeDeserialize class.
ClientFrame() - Constructor for class Chat.ClientFrame
Creates new form ClientFrame
ClientInfoSeirialized - Class in Chat
This class holds all the data which the clients need to pass as fields.
The clients send this class as a string to the server (Using the class SerializeDeserialize).
ClientInfoSeirialized() - Constructor for class Chat.ClientInfoSeirialized
 
ClientThread(Socket) - Constructor for class Chat.ServerFrame.Server.ClientThread
The constructor.
closeAllClients() - Method in class Chat.ServerFrame.Server
Traversing the clients' list and terminating each using the method closeConnection of class ClientThread.
closeConnection() - Method in class Chat.ServerFrame.Server.ClientThread
Closes completely the connection with a client corresponding with this class.
clostSockInOut() - Method in class Chat.ClientFrame
Terminates the connection with the server.
conDisconOfServer() - Method in class Chat.ClientFrame
This method handles the connection or a disconnection from the server.
connectedClients - Variable in class Chat.ServerFrame.Server
 
curClient - Variable in class Chat.ServerFrame.Server.ClientThread
